name: ci_unsorted_books
label: Unsorted reference books
desc:
A satchel of reference books which cover some branch of esoteric knowledge or another.
These won't be terribly useful as they are, but perhaps if you organize them in the library then some patterns will be made more clear.

name: ci_unsorted_pamphlets
label: Unsorted pamphlets
desc: A scattering of pamphlets which deal with the basics of some branch of esoteric knowledge or another.

name: ci_unsorted_tomes
label: Unsorted tomes
desc: A waterproof chest of tomes and grimoires, containing the secrets of some branch of esoteric knowledge or another.
